title: Twitter Stock Tumbles Premarket After Elon Musk Says Deal Is on Hold
sub_head: Shares of Twitter shed 11% before the opening bell, on pace to open at their lowest level since March
body:
Shares of Twitter Inc. tumbled in premarket trading after Elon Musk said his deal to buy the social-media company was on hold.
Shares of Twitter shed 11% before the opening bell, falling to $40.33. If shares of the company open at that price Friday, it would mark the lowest level for the stock since early April, just before Mr. Musk disclosed a surprise 9% stake in the company.
